message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $95. It's a great opportunity to get it at a discount.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $95 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to pay closer to $85.  Let me know if you're willing to negotiate.
I appreciate your interest in our product, Bob. Considering your feedback, I'm willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer is $90 for the product.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $90 is closer to my target, I'm still hoping to get it for $87. This would be a fair price for both of us.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to meet somewhere in the middle. My counteroffer is $88 for the product.
